message.content:
{"id": "13725", 
  "title": "Revert operation is slower than close and reopen in java editor", 
  "description": "The revert operation in the java editor is significantly slower compared to closing and reopening the file.", 
  "OB": "Currently, when using the revert operation, the file contents take longer to reload compared to closing and reopening the file.", 
  "EB": "However, the revert operation should not be slower than the close and reopen process.", 
  "SR": "Investigate and optimize the revert operation in the java editor to improve its performance and make it as fast as closing and reopening the file."}

origin.input_content:
